headline: JPMorgan’s $20 Billion EA Financing to Be Split Among Banks
summary: The deal, orchestrated by the buyers of the video-game maker — private equity firm Silver Lake Management, Saudi Arabia’s Public Investment Fund and Affinity Partners — would shift some risk off of JPMorgan by bringing other financial firms into the fold.  Around 15 banks are likely to join the underwriting group, some as early as next week.

raw.headline: JPMorgan’s $20 Billion EA Financing to Be Split Among Banks

headline: Battlefield 6 Shatters Records Becoming the Biggest Launch in Franchise History
summary: REDWOOD CITY, Calif., October 16, 2025--Battlefield 6 hit all-time highs for franchise sales during the first three days of launch, selling over 7 million copies and counting.

headline: Is Electronic Arts (EA) Stock Outpacing Its Consumer Discretionary Peers This Year?
